snippet: During the first visit by a pontiff since 1989, Pope Francis will preach to laid-off workers and the country will witness a beatification.
abstract: Pope Francis prepares to visit to South Korea, his first Far East trip as pontiff, in what will be an important test of whether his popularity in the Americas and parts of Europe transfers to Asia.

byline.contributor: Jim Yardley contributed reporting from Forte dei Marmi, Italy, and Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome.

lead_paragraph: During the first visit by a pontiff since 1989, Pope Francis will preach to laid-off workers and the country will witness a beatification.

headline.main: In Pope’s Trip to South Korea, Church Envisions Growth
headline.print_headline: In Pope’s Trip to South Korea, Church Envisions Growth
